details.description: A beautiful property with great amenities.
Good sized lounge, dining, Parking available inside section. Close to the bus stop. Moving cost, 1 week rent in advance, 4 weeks rent as bond, total $2500.

Studio apartment, Central CBD - Queen Street. Comfortable studio apartment in central Queen Street, Auckland CBD. Fully self-contained with its own kitchen and laundry facilities. All white-ware is provided (Fridge/freezer, Full-size stove, microwave, washing machine/dryer).

This modern fully furnished one-bedroom apartment has become available in QUEENS RESIDENCE. Sought after new building close to everything that Auckland has to offer, these apartments don't last long on the market.

What's included:
- Fully furnished
- All cookware, dinnerware, cutlery
- All appliances including a tall fridge
- Modern furniture, table chairs, couch, drawers, TV etc.
- Washing machine with a separate dryer
- Comfy Queen size bed with built-in wardrobe
- Spacious storage locker for extra space needed
- Onsite gym, sauna & swimming pool free of use

Don't miss out, book a viewing now or send an email to our agent to arrange a suitable time.

This newly renovated, tidy 2 bedroom 1 bathroom home is perfect for a small family or working couple. The owners have put much care into this property with the renovation, a great deck opening up from the living room to soak up the sun, and plenty of lawns for the entire family to enjoy. There is a garage as a bonus and an off-street car park. There are plenty of great childcare centers, shopping centers, parks, and public transport services all a stroll away.

Climber Property is dedicated to finding your next home and caring for it with you.

FEATURES:
- Furnished STUDIO apartment
- Studio equipped with a panel heater
- Bathroom with shower, vanity, and toilet
- Tidy kitchen with cupboard spaces
- Water included in the rent
- This handy studio located in Upper Queen Street, close to K Road, shops, and public transports, walking distance to CBD and universities.
- TOTAL MOVE-IN COST: 4 Weeks Bond + 1st Weeks Rent.

Limited tenure - due to renovations throughout the complex. Spacious apartment with a large deck. Bathroom with an additional separate toilet. Across the road from Westfield Shopping mall, and the complex backs onto MAGS school grounds. Close to all public transport. Water included.

Unit with 3 double bedrooms, 1 bathroom plus an extra toilet, kitchen/dining. Beds, tables, sofa can be included or not. Convenient location, close to bus stop, shops, St Luke's Mall. Mt Albert Grammar zone.

Light and sunny 2 bedroom unit in the perfect central location, with easy access to public transport and motorways. 3 minutes' walk to Mt Eden village. End unit with a single car lock-up garage - suits a smaller car. Double grammar zone too! 1 double bedroom and 1 single. Suitable for up to 3 people. In zone for Auckland Grammar, Epsom Girls Grammar & Mt Albert Grammar, as well as Auckland Normal Intermediate, Balmoral School & Mt Eden Normal Primary. Long term contract preferred.

Recently refurbished 2 bedroom brick and tile unit in a block of 3. This spacious 2 bedroom unit has a combined kitchen and dining and a separate lounge with a heat pump. It has been repainted throughout and has a new bathroom and kitchen. There is off-street parking for one car. Lawns included in the rent. Great location, handy to local bus routes, schools, parks, and restaurants.
